detail_desc: Polo shirt in fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Top in softly draping silk with a lace trim at the top and V-neck. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a rounded hem.
Clip earrings in silver-plated metal with faceted sparkly stone fringes. Length approx. 7 cm.
Padded jacket with a padded hood with a faux fur trim, and a stand-up collar. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped front pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in cotton with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Two elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and elastic at the hem. Medium support.
Trainers in imitation leather with imitation suede details and lacing at the front. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid. Black is always in style! This liquid will retain the colour of your clothes while treating stains and cleaning them even at low temperatures. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable fabric with a rounded collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Set with a wrapover bodysuit and trousers in ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a frill trim at the top and press-studs at the side and crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist and frill trim at the hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hi-tops with lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with long raglan sleeves.
Sleeveless satin dress with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, opening at the back and a seam at the hips with a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. A-line dress in soft, textured organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the back, side pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.

Short beach dress in an airy cotton weave containing glittery threads. Round neckline with a V-neck opening and narrow ties at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered tiers at the hem for added width.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Short shirt dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with short sleeves.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a high waist, buttons down the front and shaping darts at the back. Unlined.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with embroidery in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Fine-knit trainers with an elasticated top edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh insoles.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves, a concealed zip down the back and a seam at the waist with a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Blouse in airy satin with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with gathers and pleats at the front. Long sleeves, cuffs with a short slit, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication around the top.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim at the top and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Patterned canvas shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, and one zipped inner compartment. Size approx. 24x34x35 cm.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Fitted puffer jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist, zipped front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Pre-tied bow tie in satin with an adjustable strap and fastener at the back. Width 11 cm. The polyester content of the bow tie is partly recycled.
Sleeveless playsuit in jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft, fine-knit wool. Width 26 cm, circumference 54 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, a detachable tie belt at the waist and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 9 cm.
One-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with one narrow shoulder strap and one short sleeve. The shoulder strap has a decorative bow at the front.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and a small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and an ankle-height shaft with reflective details. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 4.5-5 cm.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Slim-fit, ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen. Zip in one side and straight legs that flare at the hem.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Striped jumper knitted in a soft cashmere blend in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk blend with a round neckline. Ribbed trim around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.

Checked shirt in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Off-the-shoulder top in spotted mesh with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the arms. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Body in stretch viscose jersey with a V-neck, open back with ties at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch. Double layer at the top.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny, tapered legs.
5-pocket denim jeans with a multistretch function that stretches in four directions for full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 9 cm.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Frill with overlocked edges on the shoulders.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Top in textured-knit fast-drying, functional, breathable fabric. Long raglan sleeves with reflective details and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a cut-out section at the top, a high cut at the back, high-cut legs and press-studs at the crotch.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Cut-out section with ties at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave with fluttery flounces and a high waist with wide smocking for a close fit. Unlined.
